div.p: I do hope to be able to leave here next Monday but it depends on Judge Barnitys return he writes that he will be here this week if so I can get off I have to go to Helena again on thursday night and return friday night, I will get away as soon as I can for I hate this uncertainty and we have nothing to do so I sit in the office and read novels all day there was a slight front this morning and for three days past there has been a cold rain storm and lots of mud Frank Orme sends his respects and says Ritchie must not forget him I have nothing more to say so good bye love and kisses to all
